amendment.description: To restore funding for education programs that are cut and reduce debt by closing corporate tax loopholes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 143 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 49. Record Vote Number: 45.

action.text: Amendment SA 143 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S2614-2617, S2624-2628; text: CR S2614-2615) To restore funding for education programs that are cut and reduce debt by closing corporate tax loopholes.
